mapper.sql: site_id, site_name, display_name, lat, lon, network, active, display_order
mapper.select:
SELECT
from (select distinct
tsd.site_id,
site_id,
case when nwis_site_no is null then short_name else nwis_site_no end as site_name, name as display_name, decimal_latitude lat, decimal_longitude lon, case when network_name = 'GCDAMP' then 'GCDAMP' when network_name = 'Dinosaur' then 'DINO' when network_name = 'BigBend' then 'BIBE' when network_name = 'Canyonlands' then 'CL' when network_name = 'RiverDelta' then 'CRD' when network_name = 'Chippewa' then 'CHIP' when network_name = 'UpperRioGrande' then 'URG' else network_name end as network, active, display_order from
(select site_id, display from time_series_display union select distinct qwp.site_id, 'Y' as display from qw_por_star qwp) tsd left outer join site_star on tsd.site_id = site_star.site_id where display = 'Y'
site_star
) t_a_main
network = #{net}
ORDER BY DISPLAY_ORDER, SITE_ID
mapper.sql: group_id, start_dt, end_dt, site_name, sample_method, use_pump_coloring, group_name, display_name, units, units_short, decimal_places, display_order, is_visible
mapper.select:
SELECT
from (select qwp.group_id, to_char (earliest_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_dt, to_char (latest_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_dt, site_name, qwp.sample_method sample_method, qwp.use_pump_coloring use_pump_coloring, qwp.group_name display_name, g.name group_name, g.units_name units, g.units_name_short units_short, g.decimal_places, g.display_order, 'Y' is_visible from qw_por_star qwp, group_name g where qwp.group_id = g.group_id and qwp.group_id in (89, 90, 92)) t_a_summary
site_name = #{site}
order by display_order, sample_method desc, group_id

SELECT
from (select case when s.nwis_site_no is not null then s.nwis_site_no else s.short_name end as site_nm, p.pub_link url, p.pub_nm display_name, p.priority_va display_order from pub_site p, site_star s where p.site_id = s.site_id) t_a_pubs
site_nm = #{site}
order by display_order, site_nm

SELECT
from (select s.nwis_site_no site_no, s.short_name short_nm, ccs.proto_org_cd org_cd, ccs.priority_va display_order from collection_cred_site ccs, site_star s where ccs.site_id = s.site_id) t_a_credit
(site_no = #{site} or short_nm = #{site})
(site_no = #{siteUp} or short_nm = #{siteUp})
or (site_no = #{siteDown} or short_nm = #{siteDown})
order by display_order, site_no
mapper.sql: group_id, group_name, start_dt, end_dt, site_name, site_display_name, display_order, display_name, is_visible, is_downloadable, units, units_short, decimal_places, description
mapper.select:
SELECT
from (select t_por.group_id, group_name, site_name, site_display_name, to_char (earliest_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as start_dt, to_char (latest_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') as end_dt, display_order, display_name, units, units_short, decimal_places, display as is_visible, downloadable as is_downloadable, time_series_display.description from (select site_id, group_id, earliest_dt, latest_dt from time_series_por) t_por left outer join (select site_id, case when nwis_site_no is null then short_name else nwis_site_no end as site_name, name as site_display_name from site_star) site on t_por.site_id = site.site_id left outer join (select group_id, name as group_name, display_order, name_display as display_name, units_name as units, units_name_short as units_short, decimal_places from group_name) t_group on t_por.group_id = t_group.group_id left outer join time_series_display on time_series_display.group_id = t_por.group_id and time_series_display.site_id = t_por.site_id) t_a_main
site_name = #{site}
order by display_order, group_id
